QuestData.Title: Hyena Extermination
QuestData.Description: Hey $n, we've got a real problem here. There's an overpopulation of hyenas just west of the Sludge Fen, and they're starting to become a menace.$B$BIf I have to listen to them caterwauling one more night, I just might go crazy! Vernon over there says the hyenas might even have made off with one of his stabled pigs. We can't have that happening.$B$BCan you go thin out the hyena numbers? You'll find them parading in broad daylight to the west.
QuestData.CompletionText: I should have brought earplugs. I didn't realize the Barrens could be so noisy.
QuestData.RewardText: Good riddance! Those filthy pests are more trouble than they're worth.
